importantArticles.headline: At around 17%, AGNC Investment (NASDAQ: AGNC) has one of the highest dividend yields around. AGNC is a mortgage real estate investment trust (REIT) that holds a portfolio of agency mortgage-backed securities (MBSes).

Here's why I believe investors who want a combination of income and capital appreciation will likely be better off with these two property-owning real estate investment trusts over mortgage-focused AGNC.  What does AGNC Investment do?
